title: Never Trap a Kobold in Your House
itunes:title: Never Trap a Kobold in Your House
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
You've been warned...

***

Written by: Porphyria and Narrated by: Alicia Atkins

***

Bonus Episode: "The Trapdoor House" written by Ryan Peacock

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Sound Design by Steve Blizin of Black Crow Audio

***

Title music by Alex Aldea


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
